assessments.status_rationale: Coverage notes ETF outflows and a bearish tone for crypto, but provides no verified BTC price print confirming a UTC day at or below $85,000; the deadline has not yet passed.
No Adobe Analytics Thanksgiving Day 2025 spending figure is cited; this metric is typically released after the holiday and before the stated deadline.
While risk-off headlines appear, there is no report of the VIX closing at or above 20.00; the window remains open.
No authoritative report mentions ERCOT hourly wind generation reaching 32,000 MW; the deadline is still in the future.
There is no U.S. Central Command announcement of strikes on Iran-aligned militias in Iraq or Syria in today’s coverage; the deadline has not elapsed.

Today’s tech news highlights Google Gemini 3 and an Anthropic valuation but no AWS News Blog or press release announcing a new Trainium generation; re:Invent timing still allows for such an announcement.
The KEV criterion applies to additions dated Dec 16–31, which has not begun; no evidence toward the 20-CVE threshold is available yet.
No AAA national average gasoline price print at or below $2.95/gal is referenced; the outcome remains unresolved ahead of the deadline.
Despite market risk-off commentary, there is no cited FRED DGS10 close at or below 4.00%; the timeframe is still open.
No official Council of the EU press release adopting a new Russia sanctions package is mentioned; the deadline has not yet arrived.
There is no Weekly Claims report in today’s news showing continuing claims at or above 1,900,000; the outcome remains open.
